title: InitializePropertyInstance (Function)
text:
FUNCTION InitializePropertyInstance : BOOL
Initializes a IEC_BACNET_PROPERTY_INSTANCE with the given parameters and data.

rows.Name: ePropAccess
rows.Comment: The access specifier to use for initialization.

rows: The property ID to use for initialization.
The data type to use for initialization.
The number of elements to use for initialization.
The data size to use for initialization.
The data to use for initialization.

rows.Name: propInst
rows.Comment:
After a successfull call the initialized property instance
data is written to thuis structure.
